item.title: USC 1329 Decode 坑坑坑gets
item.description: 此页面通过工具从 csdn 导出，格式可能有问题。 using namespace std; const int INF = 999999999; const double eps = 1e-6; int T,I,n,m,t; LL tt, sum; int a[1111]; int f[1111]; int dp[888][888]; char s[888]; char ans[888]; char ss[888]; int so(int v){ if (a[v] == v ) return 1; int t = a[v]; int res = 1; while (t!=v){
